Landing.CallToAction: Explore Destiny utilizando o Braytech e obtenha boas vantagens e detalhes sobre suas lutas contra as for√ßas das Trevas

Features.Description:
ü¶ò Destiny 2 character progression, clans, triumphs, collections, and more. Braytech is a Destiny fan site that allows users to view and map checklists, track and view triumphs, inspect collectibles, and so much more.

Braytech started as a checklist app and has bellowed into a monstrosity of many talents. It's always being refined and expanded.

Need to find something quick? Press Óªñ and start typing! Braytech has a search interface, available anywhere in the app.

Braytech is built for desktop users first, but functions as well and looks as beautiful on smaller devices. In fact, there's an [iPhone app](https://apps.apple.com/app/braytech/id1593151816) and an [Android app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=braytech.org.twa). Want to make a suggestion? Join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech)!
Features.Name: ü¶ò Braytech

Support.Description:
ü¶ò Braytech is a full-time job‚ÄîI design and develop to improve myself and to aid all Guardians. I'm anti-ads, to my own demise. Your support helps me keep the lights on and allows me to do my best work and to make your Destiny experience even better. I hope you love using it as much as I love building it! üíñ

Join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) and the other patrons in the Braytech Research Division.
Support.Name: ü¶ò Are you a fan? Show your support

Landing.PollsChannel: ü¶ò Join the conversation on [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) and vote on how Braytech can improve.

Subscriptions.Info:
ü¶ò Ads suck so Braytech doesn't use them, but none of this is free or easy!

In place of ads, I depend on your generosity. Your support helps keep the app online, enables me to work on new features, and pays my rent!

Subscribe at one of the following tiers for cool rewards such as profile medals!
Subscriptions.AuthRequired: ü¶ò Authenticate with Bungie.net to create or manage a subscription.

State.Ending: ü¶ò You subscribed on **{{created}}** and your subscription will **end** on **{{currentPeriodEnd}}**.
State.Renewing: ü¶ò You subscribed on **{{created}}** and your subscription will **renew** on **{{currentPeriodEnd}}**.

DiscordProfile.Disconnected: ü¶ò Connect your Discord profile by using the `/register_discord_with_voluspa` command in the Discord [server](https://discord.bray.tech).

Subscriptions.Help: ü¶ò You can get help with this at any time by jumping on [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) or by emailing [subscriptions@bray.tech](mailto:subscriptions@bray.tech).

BraytechLegend.Info:
ü¶ò Brandish your profile with a unique username to make sharing easier, select a triumph or tracker to highlight when your profile is shared, and choose a character to default to when a link to your profile is shared without a character specified.

[Subscribers](/settings/subscriptions) get many benefits including the ability to grab a custom username.
BraytechLegend.AuthRequired: ü¶ò To alter your legend, you need to first authenticate Braytech with Bungie.net.
BraytechLegend.SubscriptionRequired: ü¶ò To claim a username and other cool tricks, you need to be a subscriber. [Support Braytech](/settings/subscriptions) through a subscription.
BraytechLegend.Username:
ü¶ò Select a unique username or fallback to your Bungie name. You can change this at any time.

A branding specialist is available upon request for a modest fee.
BraytechLegend.UsernameSpecifications: ü¶ò Maximum length for usernames is 127 characters. Any word character (equivalent to [a-zA-Z0-9_]) and some emoji are supported.
BraytechLegend.DefaultCharacter:
ü¶ò You can choose a character to be a default for links shared without a character identifier.

For example, if you share a link to https://bray.tech/@/{{username}}, Braytech will ask the viewer to select a character. You can select a preferred character instead.
BraytechLegend.ShareHighlight: ü¶ò When your profile is shared, an image specific to you is generated. You can choose to highlight a triumph or tracker you're proud of. This will also be displayed on the [Legend](/legend) view.

Subscriptions.Info:
ü¶ò Ads suck so Braytech doesn't use them, but building Braytech costs time.

In place of ads, Braytech depends on your generosity. Your support helps keep the app online, enables work on new features, and keeps the developer alive and housed!
Subscriptions.RewardSeraph: ü¶ò Unlock the **Seraph** medal, a symbol of dedication and commitment to protecting the Warmind and its assets, and bettering humankind.

Subscriptions.Rewards: ü¶ò Unlock unique profile medals when you subscribe to Braytech's Patreon.
Subscriptions.Leaderboards: ü¶ò Leaderboards are a lot of work, which while thought-provoking, is particularly costly. I had to buy Databases for Dummies and everything. If you like collecting things, maybe we could [interest you in unlocking some a rare medal](https://www.patreon.com/braytech) for your Braytech profile?
